official_title: A bill to authorize and direct the Secretary of the Interior to quitclaim to Kaiser Steel Corporation the remaining interest of the United States in and to certain public lands in Riverside County, California.

summary.text: Authorizes and directs the Secretary of the Iinterior to quitclaim to Kaiser Steel Corporation the remaining interest of the United States in and to certain public lands in Riverside County, California.

titles.title: A bill to authorize and direct the Secretary of the Interior to quitclaim to Kaiser Steel Corporation the remaining interest of the United States in and to certain public lands in Riverside County, California.
